title: Limited Time or I can buy later on
body: FIrst topic. Hey, I enjoy league of legends a LOT and best part about it is the skins. They're amazing and recently Bloodmoon Diana and Bloodmoon Talon have been released but i was wondering if I only have one chance to buy them now or if I can buy them later on. Thanks a lot.

replies.body: Thanks a lot guys. Really appreciate it and if i need more help, I will ask. Again...Thanks.
there's a limited availability tab in the store that contains legacy skins, if it isn't there then you might need to check legacy client.

Since none of the other Blood Moon skins are limited and are still available in the store, I don't believe the new Blood Moon skins will be limited either. 

I hope this helped. If you have any further questions, let me know. ^.^

I don't see any mention of the new Bloodmoon skins being legacy on the announcement [page ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/blood-moon-rising)so they should be available for purchase throughout the year.
